unnormalised: **Automotive News: Decoding Fuel Efficiency for the Indian Driver**
normalised: Automotive News: Decoding Fuel Efficiency for the Indian Driver

unnormalised: New Delhi - With rising fuel costs, understanding fuel efficiency has become crucial for Indian car buyers. Experts at IIT-Madras are conducting research into optimizing engine performance for Indian driving conditions, which often involve congested city roads and variable speeds.
normalised: New Delhi - With rising fuel costs, understanding fuel efficiency has become crucial for Indian car buyers. Experts at I I T-Madras are conducting research into optimizing engine performance for Indian driving conditions, which often involve congested city roads and variable speeds.

unnormalised: Fuel efficiency, typically measured in kilometers per liter (km/l), indicates how far a vehicle can travel on one liter of fuel. Factors influencing this include driving habits, vehicle maintenance, and even tire pressure. Dr. Sharma, a leading automotive engineer, advises regular servicing to maintain optimal engine performance.

unnormalised: Aggressive acceleration and braking significantly reduce fuel economy. Smooth, consistent driving is key. Also, removing unnecessary weight from the car can improve efficiency. Even something as simple as decluttering your boot, removing items you don't need, can help. Imagine, that old cricket kit taking up valuable space!

unnormalised: Properly inflated tires also reduce rolling resistance, boosting km/l figures. Think of it like cycling – it’s easier with inflated tires! The Automotive Research Association of India (ARAI) provides certified fuel efficiency figures for vehicles sold in India, offering a benchmark for consumers. Consider this when making your next vehicle purchase, and save those hard-earned Rs. for a plate of delicious biryani at Paradise Restaurant in Hyderabad, instead of constantly refuelling! Remember that even the size of your garage (say, 150 sq ft) can dictate the size, and thus efficiency, of car you choose!
